artist: Author: Frank B. Hobbs; Publisher: Frank B. Hobbs , Boston, Mass.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Stab stitched binding along the top, with an image of a man wearng a crown of thorns, and text; 42 pp.
inscription:
Lower right corner of front cover, black ink pen: poetry (sad face)
Lower edge of rear cover interior, black ink pen: WRITINS (copyright symbol) FRANK B. HOBBS PHOTO (copyright symbol) 1994 THEDA GORE
Rear cover, black ink pen: FRANK / P.O. BOX 292 / BOSTON MASS / 02101
title: Frank's Depression Poetry
